snippet: Chief executive Tony Scholes has said that while Stoke City have survived fairly comfortably since earning promotion to the Premier League in 2008, they have never taken their top-flight status for granted....

headline.main: Stoke Can Never Take Top-Flight Status for Granted-CEO
headline.print_headline: Stoke Can Never Take Top-Flight Status for Granted-CEO

lead_paragraph: Chief executive Tony Scholes has said that while Stoke City have survived fairly comfortably since earning promotion to the Premier League in 2008, they have never taken their top-flight status for granted.

snippet: Manchester City captain Vincent Kompany is facing an extended spell on the sidelines and may only be fit for the final part of the season, manager Manuel Pellegrini has said....

headline.main: Man City's Kompany Ruled Out Until Last Part of Season
headline.print_headline: Man City's Kompany Ruled Out Until Last Part of Season

lead_paragraph: Manchester City captain Vincent Kompany is facing an extended spell on the sidelines and may only be fit for the final part of the season, manager Manuel Pellegrini has said.

snippet: South Korea coach Uli Stielike has recalled Tottenham Hotspur star Son Heung-min ahead of next month's 2018 World Cup qualification games against Qatar and Iran....

headline.main: South Korea Recalls Son for Qatar, Iran World Cup Qualifiers
headline.print_headline: South Korea Recalls Son for Qatar, Iran World Cup Qualifiers

lead_paragraph: South Korea coach Uli Stielike has recalled Tottenham Hotspur star Son Heung-min ahead of next month's 2018 World Cup qualification games against Qatar and Iran.

snippet: Former Liverpool manager Brendan Rodgers believes lack of European football will be an advantage for the club in the Premier League and same will be the case for Chelsea....

headline.main: No European Football Advantage for Chelsea, Liverpool-Rodgers
headline.print_headline: No European Football Advantage for Chelsea, Liverpool-Rodgers

lead_paragraph: Former Liverpool manager Brendan Rodgers believes lack of European football will be an advantage for the club in the Premier League and same will be the case for Chelsea.

snippet: Swansea City boss Bob Bradley came out fighting on Thursday despite being favourite with British bookmakers to be the next Premier League manager to lose his job....

headline.main: Fighting Talk From Swansea Boss Bradley
headline.print_headline: Fighting Talk From Swansea Boss Bradley

lead_paragraph: Swansea City boss Bob Bradley came out fighting on Thursday despite being favourite with British bookmakers to be the next Premier League manager to lose his job.

snippet: Aston Villa was relegated for the first time since 1987 after a 1-0 road loss to Manchester United on Saturday in the English Premier League....

headline.main: Loss to United Seals Aston Villa’s Slide Into Relegation
headline.print_headline: Loss to United Seals Aston Villa’s Slide Into Relegation

abstract: Soccer Roundup; Manchester United defeats Aston Villa, 1-0; other soccer matches noted.
lead_paragraph: Aston Villa was relegated for the first time since 1987 after a 1-0 road loss to Manchester United on Saturday in the English Premier League.

snippet: Bournemouth striker Yann Kermorgant has joined Reading for an undisclosed fee, the Premier League club said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Striker Kermorgant Leaves Bournemouth for Reading
headline.print_headline: Striker Kermorgant Leaves Bournemouth for Reading

lead_paragraph: Bournemouth striker Yann Kermorgant has joined Reading for an undisclosed fee, the Premier League club said on Wednesday.

snippet: Britain’s sports minister, John Whittingdale, called for an inquiry after a newspaper report alleged that a London-based doctor treated more than 150 sports stars with banned performance-enhancing drugs....
abstract: British sports minister John Whittingdale orders inquiry into London-based Dr Mark Bonar, who reportedly treated more than 150 sports stars with banned performance-enhancing drugs.
lead_paragraph: Britain’s sports minister, John Whittingdale, called for an inquiry after a newspaper report alleged that a London-based doctor treated more than 150 sports stars with banned performance-enhancing drugs.

snippet: Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri has urged his players to stay focussed in matches and work better as a team in order to recapture the consistency that propelled them to an unexpected Premier League triumph last season....

headline.main: Leicester's Ranieri Calls for Consistency After Mixed Start
headline.print_headline: Leicester's Ranieri Calls for Consistency After Mixed Start

lead_paragraph: Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri has urged his players to stay focussed in matches and work better as a team in order to recapture the consistency that propelled them to an unexpected Premier League triumph last season.

snippet: Wales captain Ashley Williams, who guided his country to the Euro 2016 semi-finals, has joined Everton from Swansea City on a three-year contract, the Premier League clubs said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Wales Captain Williams Swaps Swansea for Everton
headline.print_headline: Wales Captain Williams Swaps Swansea for Everton

lead_paragraph: Wales captain Ashley Williams, who guided his country to the Euro 2016 semi-finals, has joined Everton from Swansea City on a three-year contract, the Premier League clubs said on Wednesday.
